channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Activists say Mexican authorities have broken up 2 migrant caravans heading to the US
item.description: Mexican immigration authorities have broken up two small migrant caravans headed to the U.S. border, activists said Saturday.

item.title: Netflix’s ‘Joy’ Shows Early Fears About The Moral Fallout Of IVF Were Justified
item.description: 'Joy' not only diminishes the earliest anxieties about IVF but seeks to mask them under a dramatized, one-sided version of a feel-good story.

item.title: MN City ‘Likely Disposed Of’ 21 Ballots In Race Decided For Dem Candidate By 14 Votes
item.description: Two close state House races flipped from Republicans to Democrats, and one of those races has missing ballots.

item.title: Democrat Activists Exploit Tragic Miscarriages Like Mine To Sell Abortions
item.description: Unlike miscarriage, abortion directly and intentionally kills an innocent child who is living, growing, and developing.

item.title: Lori Chavez-DeRemer Would Be A Disaster As Labor Secretary
item.description: Republicans should take the side of their own voters instead of listening to decadent union goons like Sean O’Brien.

item.title: How ‘Gladiator II’ Rejected Masculinity
item.description: In 'Gladiator,' Maximus embodied masculinity in the highest order. In 'Gladiator II,' masculinity is treated like a bad joke.

item.title: Donald Trump threatens 100% tariff on the BRIC bloc of nations if they act to undermine U.S. dollar
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday threatened 100% tariffs against a bloc of nine nations if they act to undermine the U.S. dollar.

item.title: Dismantling the Department of Education Isn’t Enough
item.description: State institutions that violate parental rights must be held accountable.

item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday announced that he wanted Kash Patel, a fierce Trump loyalist, to run the FBI.

item.title: Art Happenings, Sublime and Ridiculous
item.description: Things went bananas at Sotheby’s when it turned from Tiffany to Chiquita, with a crypto-bro forking over $6.2 million for a bad joke.
